trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_SEQ_00<tab>Tapklix is eyeing you suspiciously.

TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_SEQ_01<tab>Tapklix accuses you of being a thief sent by the Illuminati. Uninterested in your words, he insists that you let your actions attest to your innocence by finding and eliminating an Illuminati patrol.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_SEQ_02<tab>You stop the patrol in its tracks and leave no survivors. However, you sense there are yet more Illuminati lurking nearby. Find them and eliminate them.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_SEQ_03<tab>The last of the Illuminati have been dealt with. Return to Tapklix now that your allegiance is clear.

TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_SEQ_04<tab>Tapklix is glad to have seen your battle against the Illuminati. Using the age-old logic that the enemy of his enemy is his friend, he concludes that you are a true friend to the goblins of Idyllshire.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TODO_00<tab>Slay Illuminati patrols at the designated area.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TODO_01<tab>Slay Illuminati at the other designated area.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TODO_02<tab>Report to Tapklix.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... You are stranger! You are sneakypeeker! You are thief working for Illuminati!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_001<tab>You can't take these things! No, no, no! They are for all to enjoy! But Illuminati always try to steal and hide things. Tapklix must be on constant guard.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_002<tab>If you say you are gobbiefriend, then prove it! Find Illuminati and defeat them. Drive them away from this place!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_010<tab>Prove you are gobbiefriend! Find Illuminati and defeat them!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_100<tab>Bow to Illuminati!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_105<tab>Tear you apart!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_110<tab>Tear you to shreds!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_020<tab>Prove you are gobbiefriend! Find Illuminati and defeat them!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_115<tab>There <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is! Kill <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_120<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Cut you to pieces!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_BALLOON_000_125<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Cut you to ribbons!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_030<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... You slew Illuminati fightyforce! You are true gobbiefriend.
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_031<tab>The things here are for all people of Idyllshire. But Illuminati try to steal them away!
TEXT_HEAVNZ806_01936_TAPKLIX_000_032<tab>Illuminati is our enemy. Illuminati is your enemy. This means you are our friend!
